definition: to smoke/to fumigate/to assail the nostrils/to perfume
fragrance/warm/to educate/variant of 熏[xun1]/to smoke/to fumigate

sentences.english: Too bad he was three times my age and stank heavily of poo.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧的是他年龄是我的三倍大，而且身上屎臭熏天。

sentences.english: He takes a trip in the tight, smelly night mail-coach for Clavering.
sentences.chinese: 他乘一辆拥挤的，气味熏天的夜班邮车去克拉弗林。

sentences.english: That abominable place was so dirty and evil smelling that he turned away in disgust.
sentences.chinese: 这个鬼地方如此肮脏而且臭气熏天，他厌恶地走开了。

sentences.english: What was it like day after day in their fetid cargo bay?
sentences.chinese: 在恶臭熏天的货舱中日复一日的生活是什么样的？

sentences.english: Heavy rain finally saved the day and rid London of its smell.
sentences.chinese: 滂沱大雨挽救了局面，让伦敦免于臭气熏天。

sentences.english: A man will wear the same pair of shoes all day.
sentences.chinese: 男人，早晚一双鞋，不到臭气熏天不带换的。

sentences.english: The window was closed and the stink was overpowering.
sentences.chinese: 窗户关得严严的，房间里臭气熏天。

definition: billowing smoke (idiom)/foul atmosphere/(fig.) murky atmosphere/in a turmoil
to be in a position of power
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
angry, but not daring to speak out (idiom); obliged to remain silent about one's resentment/unable to voice objections
pinyin: gan3 nu4 er2 bu4 gan3 yan2

definition: tyrannical abuse (idiom); riding roughshod over people
to oppress/to rule as a despot/to tyrannize
the emperor relatives (idiom); person with powerful connections
(of greed, lust etc) to dominate one's thoughts
to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc)/to hold as one's personal fiefdom
